entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stettler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stettler 08:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -18.3°C
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
